description: [SdkServiceException.retryable()](https://sdk.amazonaws.com/java/api/latest/software/amazon/awssdk/core/exception/SdkException.html#retryable--) and [AwsServiceException.retryable()](https://sdk.amazonaws.com/java/api/latest/software/amazon/awssdk/awscore/exception/AwsServiceException.html#retryable--) now returns `true` when appropriate. Previously it always returned `false`.
